div.a: Preschool Application

span.p: The Bellevue Preschool is a grant-funded program for children who turn 4 by August 1. Your family must also meet income requirements. The preschool also accepts students who are on an IEP. Children who turn 3 by August 1 are also accepted if space is available.

p.a: Click HERE to download and print the application.

div.a: Senior Students/Parents: May 1st is the yearbook deadline for baby pictures/messages. They are free of charge this year. Please read --->

div.a: BCS Parent Guide

span.p: Please click on the following link for A BCS Parent Guide to Continued Learning Outside of our Schools.
Important information to help guide parents/students for learning outside of our buildings. Please email general questions to ask@bellevueschools.org.
